CommonRequestAttributes - Class in rocks.bastion.core
Contains the common attributes which usually appear in all HTTP requests.
CommonRequestAttributes(HttpMethod, String, Object) - Constructor for class rocks.bastion.core.CommonRequestAttributes
Constructs a new instance of this object containing the following initial defaults: HTTP method: Supplied as an argument this this constructor. URL: Supplied as an argument this this constructor. Name: Initialised to be the HTTP method concatenated with the URL. Content-type: Initialised to the value of ContentType.TEXT_PLAIN. Headers: Initialised to the empty collection of headers. Query parameters: Initialised to the empty collection of query parameters. Route parameters: Initialised to the empty collection of route parameters. Timeout: Falls back to globally configured timeout
Configuration - Class in rocks.bastion.core.configuration
Contains all Bastion configuration settings.

timeout() - Method in class rocks.bastion.core.GeneralRequest
 
timeout() - Method in interface rocks.bastion.core.HttpRequest
A timeout (in milliseconds) that will cause tests to cutoff if: the connection takes too long to be established the response takes too long to arrive. Note that these are 2 separate timeouts; the test might take (in the worst case) twice the value of the timeout, if the phases mentioned above take long enough.
